description: The steep, treacherous mountain range on Drum Island that must be climbed to reach the castle where Dr. Kureha lives. Known for its dangerous wildlife including Lapahns and harsh winter conditions.

keyEvents.title: Luffy and Sanji Fight Lapahns
keyEvents.description: Luffy and Sanji are attacked by dozens of ferocious Lapahns while climbing the mountain with the sick Nami.
keyEvents.significance: This battle triggers the avalanche that becomes a major obstacle.

keyEvents.title: Avalanche Strikes - Sanji Injured
keyEvents.description: A massive avalanche triggered by the Lapin battle strikes. Sanji saves Luffy and Nami but dislocates his spine.
keyEvents.significance: Creates a critical turning point where Luffy must carry both injured companions.

keyEvents.title: Luffy Rescues Baby Lapin's Parent
keyEvents.description: Luffy stops to help a baby Lapin rescue its parent trapped in the avalanche snow.
keyEvents.significance: Demonstrates Luffy's compassion and establishes goodwill with the Lapahns.

keyEvents.title: Luffy Begins Climbing with Both Nami and Sanji
keyEvents.description: Luffy begins the arduous climb up the sheer Drum Rockies while carrying both Sanji and Nami in freezing conditions.
keyEvents.significance: One of the most physically demanding feats Luffy has attempted.

statusHistory.reason: Mountain range remains a permanent geographical feature

description: A small village on Drum Island where many of the island's citizens live. It becomes the site of confrontation between Dalton and the returning Wapol.

keyEvents.title: Wapol's Forces Land at Bighorn
keyEvents.description: Former King Wapol and his crew arrive at Bighorn, intending to reclaim his throne.
keyEvents.significance: Sets up the major conflict for the remainder of the arc.

keyEvents.title: Dalton Confronts Wapol
keyEvents.description: Dalton stands up to Wapol and demands he leave Drum Island, preparing to fight despite being outnumbered.
keyEvents.significance: Marks Dalton's transformation from loyal soldier to heroic protector.

keyEvents.title: Dalton's Devil Fruit Revealed
keyEvents.description: Dalton transforms using the Ushi Ushi no Mi, Model: Bison, which is officially named.
keyEvents.significance: First time Dalton's Devil Fruit is officially named in the anime.

keyEvents.title: Chess's Arrow Attack - Dalton Protects Villagers
keyEvents.description: Dalton shields villagers from Chess's arrows, taking multiple hits himself.
keyEvents.significance: Demonstrates Dalton's evolution to true protector of the people.

keyEvents.title: Isshi-20 Doctors Debut
keyEvents.description: The Isshi-20 make their first appearance, quickly treating Wapol's injuries.
keyEvents.significance: Represents the corrupted medical system under Wapol's rule.
